summary: Test suite that validates the runner registry component, ensuring it correctly generates reports in various formats, merges results from multiple IaC frameworks, handles empty or missing inputs, extracts repository metadata, filters files, categorizes code runners, and enriches Terraform plan reports with external module handling and skipâ€‘check logic.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and accuracy of the runner registry used in the IaC scanning platform, so that downstream reporting and compliance checks operate correctly across diverse scenarios.
